title: Target Is Selling an “Absolutely Gorgeous” Storage Box That You’ll Want to Use in Every Room (It’s So Versatile!)
description: Find out why it’s so special. READ MORE...
author: Jamie Sanders
excerpt: Find out why it’s so special.
text: Kitchen & HomeTableware & DecorProduct Reviews & RecommendationsJamie SandersJamie Sanders is an LA-based copywriter and blogger with 20+ years of experience in fashion, beauty, and lifestyle. Her work has appeared in InStyle, Harper's Bazaar,…read morepublished nowWe independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.I am, by definition, what can only be considered a maximalist. I like things. Since I live in a one-bedroom apartment, though, there’s only so much room to go around for all of that stuff without it becoming super cluttered. Enter the decorative storage box.Why It WonThis versatile storage box is crafted in airy linen in a delicate, creamy hue. The structured, square-shaped silhouette has a top that nestles perfectly into the box to keep your essentials safe and sound. It’s finished with a brown faux leather handle. Have a lot or just a little to hold? There’s a storage box for that, too. It comes in two different sizes: The medium size measures 3.5x14x10.5 inches, while the larger size is 4.25x9x13 inches. This storage box does more than just hold your essentials — although, yes, that’s its goal. But it makes just as beautiful a display piece while it’s sitting there containing your clutter. Whether you store this box in your living room, a dresser in your bedroom, or a desk in your office, or atop your coffee table, it instantly lends style to your space.Speaking of the storage capabilities, this fabric storage box has them in spades. It can hold everything from remote controls and papers to small office supplies like pens, pencils, and staplers. Use them alone or stacked to create different looks.

published now

We independently select these products—if you buy from one of our links, we may earn a commission. All prices were accurate at the time of publishing.

I am, by definition, what can only be considered a maximalist. I like things. Since I live in a one-bedroom apartment, though, there’s only so much room to go around for all of that stuff without it becoming super cluttered. Enter the decorative storage box.

Why It Won

This versatile storage box is crafted in airy linen in a delicate, creamy hue. The structured, square-shaped silhouette has a top that nestles perfectly into the box to keep your essentials safe and sound. It’s finished with a brown faux leather handle. 

Have a lot or just a little to hold? There’s a storage box for that, too. It comes in two different sizes: The medium size measures 3.5x14x10.5 inches, while the larger size is 4.25x9x13 inches. 

This storage box does more than just hold your essentials — although, yes, that’s its goal. But it makes just as beautiful a display piece while it’s sitting there containing your clutter. Whether you store this box in your living room, a dresser in your bedroom, or a desk in your office, or atop your coffee table, it instantly lends style to your space.

Speaking of the storage capabilities, this fabric storage box has them in spades. It can hold everything from remote controls and papers to small office supplies like pens, pencils, and staplers. Use them alone or stacked to create different looks.
